full_summary:
**Title:** Court Reporting Services
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Reference Number**: cb-8118-87819495

The [Canada Energy Regulator](http://canadaenergyregulator.ca/) invites bidders to submit proposals for the provision of Court Reporting Services at various locations across Canada. This requirement is for the provision of verbatim reporting services in Calgary, Alberta, and other Canadian locations on an as-needed, at-the-month, in-person, or virtual, basis.

**Tender Period:**
August 14, 2023 - September 22, 2023
**Proposal Closing Time:** 16:00 PM MDT

**Subject Matter:**
The contract will be in effect for a term of three (3) years with a two (2) year optional prolonged period. It is anticipated that one (1) or two (2) contracts may be awarded.

**Conditions:**
- This tender is conditionally set aside for Indigenous businesses under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB), as per the Canada-Indigenous Procurement Directive (CIPD), Article 10.
- Tenders must adhere to the security requirements outlined in the Tender Document.
- An electronic copy of the Tender Document can be found at [CCS Yes](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/) through the contract page.
- Electronic bids must be submitted through the Electronic Tendering System.

**Free Trade Agreements:**
This tender is open to Canadian companies participating in any of the following trade agreements: Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Generic Pre-Qualification List, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, NAFTA-Canada, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras.

**Contact Information:**
 * Closing Date and Submission Details. Electronic bids must be submitted through the Electronic Tendering System. *For more information, please contact Ngan Loi, [Ngan.Loi@cer-rec.ca](mailto:Ngan.Loi@cer-rec.ca. no later than 16:00 PM MST.
- Contact Information:
